testcase.name: Verify if order deletion is Successful
testcase.system-out: Given Add valid "orderId" in resource parameter.............................passed When User calls "cancelOrder" API with orderId in "POST" https request......passed Then The API call should be "Success" with response code "200"..............passed And In response body "status" to be "Cancelled".............................passed

testcase.name: Verify if order creation is Successful with valid request parameters
testcase.system-out: Given Add request payload with valid input "ShaliniDidi" "Shalinikpmgtest1@mailinator.com" "10".passed When User calls "createOrder" API with "POST" https request.................passed Then The API call should be "Success" with response code "200"..............passed And In response body "orderStatus" should be "Created"......................passed And In response body "orderId" displayed "true".............................passed
